Remarks: The better the quality, the smoother it will be. Legitimate Hiwin is preferred, but Aliexpress alternatives will probably work ass well. Usable length is approximately rail length - 150mm

Pick any GT2 Belt that will fit your GT2 pulley. OSSM ALT version support everything up to 15mm. 15MM gives the most grip
Pick a pulley that fits your belt. A pulley that supports a 15mm belt has maximim performance, but 9 or 12mm will work as well
